title: Activist Group Claims Responsibility for Berlin Power Outage
description: The German activist network Volcano Group claimed responsibility for an arson attack that cut power to about 50,000 households and 2,000 businesses in southwest Berlin on Saturday.
content: The German activist network Volcano Group claimed responsibility for an arson attack that cut power to about 50,000 households and 2,000 businesses in southwest Berlin on Saturday.
